page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Most people living in and around Stokeinteignhead and Combeinteignhead are employed in the nearby towns of Newton Abbot, Torquay, Teignmouth, or further away in Exeter. Very few people work in the villages themselves or in agriculture. The local farms are mainly mixed and are labour intensive and usually worked by the families themselves although there is a demand for seasonal workers particularly at harvest time. Some locals work part time in service trades, viz pubs, restaurants, hotels etc. Both villages have many unemployed and also an increasing number of retired people.
